Description: Indicates whether the item is digital or physical in SPL's catalog.
Indicates whether the item was checked out physically or digitally by SPL.
Indicates whether the item is a physical or digital resource (related to Format).
Indicates the year the item was checked out.

Allowed-Values: Months ranging from January (1) to December (12)
Description: Indicates the month the item was checked out.
Indicates the number of checkouts each month.
Indicates the specific title of the work.
Indicates the general title of the work.
Notes: Was added by me in OpenRefine.

Allowed-Values: Real number, must be formatted as a standard ISBN
Description: Indicats the item's International Standard Book Number (ISBN).
Indicates the author or creator of the work.

Allowed-Values: Plain text, must be in the LCSH index
Description: Indicates the subject headings from the Library of Congress (LCSH) that describe the work.
Indicates the publisher of the work.
Indicates the year the work was published.
